front.title: IEEE Standard Test procedure for Test Procedure for Toroidal Magnetic Amplifier Cores (Including Core Material Data)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The purposes of this standard are (1) to standardize the measurement procedures and electrical test values for two circuits that are often used to match and grade magnetic cores intended for use in magnetic amplifiers and (2) to standardize the magnetic test values used to secure basic magnetic data on core materials.
